title: 5-Star Slow Cooker Recipes
description: Your slow cooker is the secret to making amazing dishes for everything from weeknight dinners to special occasion feasts. Get 5-star slow-cooker recipes for pork roast, prime rib, French onion soup, cabbage rolls, macaroni and cheese, and more.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE 8 Slow Cooker Recipes That Deliver 5-Star Flavor Low and slow is the way to go! By Emily Boyette Emily Boyette Emily Boyette is a highly qualified editor within the food media industry with eight-plus years of experience. From galleries and listicles to recipe manuscripts and articles, her knowledge of cooking goes beyond text. Emily is a writer for Allrecipes. Allrecipes' editorial guidelines Published on May 24, 2021 Your slow cooker is the secret to making amazing dishes for everything from weeknight dinners to special occasion feasts. Check out the video up top and scroll down to find 5-star favorites including pork roast and prime rib, French onion soup, cabbage rolls, and an indulgent chocolate dessert for a crowd. 01 of 08 Slow Cooker Pork Loin Roast with Brown Sugar and Sweet Potatoes Allrecipes View Recipe This sweet and savory pork loin comes together so easily in your slow cooker. Cooked atop of bed of brown sugar, butter, and sweet potatoes, this 5-star recipe is simple enough for weeknights and nice enough for company. 02 of 08 Slow Cooker French Onion Soup MyRecipes View Recipe This MyRecipes take on classic French onion soup is so easy and delicious, you might never return to your stovetop ways. The slow cooker takes care of caramelizing onions the onions (no more endless stirring) and then all you do is add beef stock, ladle the soup into ramekins, top with slices of baguette and cheese, and toast it under the broiler. 03 of 08 Slow Cooker Vegetable Soup Allrecipes View Recipe This traditional vegetable soup gets a little extra oomph from easy homemade noodle-like dumplings. Using all plant-based ingredients, it's vegan-friendly as well. 04 of 08 Best Crockpot Macaroni-And-Cheese MyRecipes View Recipe Craving ooey-gooey homemade mac-and-cheese, but lacking oven space? Try this ultra-simple 8-ingredient side dish from MyRecipes that harnesses the power of your trusty slow cooker. 05 of 08 Grandma's Hungarian Stuffed Cabbage Slow Cooker Variation Allrecipes View Recipe Use your slow cooker to make easy stuffed cabbage. Be sure to reserve some of the cabbage water for flavorful simmering in later steps. This old-fashioned recipe is pure comfort food. 06 of 08 Slow Cooker Prime Rib MyRecipes View Recipe Here's that super tasty holiday dinner recipe you've been looking for from MyRecipes. In addition to adding loads of flavor, the seasoning and overnight chill in the fridge makes for a mouthwatering crust once the roast is seared and put in the slow cooker. 07 of 08 Slow Cooker Lava Cake MyRecipes View Recipe This no-fuss MyRecipes lava cake is comfort dessert at its finest. It's dangerously good, with a perfectly cooked cake topping and a simple, but satisfying "lava" made from instant pudding. 08 of 08 Slow Cooker Shrimp Boil MyRecipes View Recipe With a simple ingredient list and a largely hands-off cooking method, this easy seafood boil from MyRecipes is a perfect recipe for casual warm weather entertaining or as a low-effort meal to make at the rental house during a beach vacation. Related Find more slow cooker recipes here. 20 Budget-Friendly Slow Cooker Dinner Recipes 23 Best Slow Cooker Recipes for Summer Explore more: Kitchen Tips Was this page helpful? Thanks for your feedback! Tell us why!
